content: this legal text is about a divorce case between mr and mrs they have made declarations and agreements regarding their property debts and other matters they have renounced inheritance rights and waived alimony the costs of the proceedings will be shared equally the divorce will be registered and take effect legally they have chosen the court where the proceedings will take place the document confirms their identity and payment of a fee the notary has special obligations to inform them of their rights and provide impartial advice due to conflicting interests they have appointed another notary and legal counsel they confirm that they have been fully informed and accept the clauses in the agreement they declare their legal capacity and sign the document in the presence of a notary
